definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Silver Wings upon their chest, These are men, America's best.
sentences.chinese: 胸前別著銀色的傘徽，他們是吾國最精銳的勁旅。

sentences.english: This is an awesome group of developers and testers.
sentences.chinese: 我們擁有一支精銳的開發者和測試者隊伍。

sentences.english: The arrival of the crack troops in the battle field augured ill for the Germans.
sentences.chinese: 精銳部隊到達戰場，預兆着德軍的潰敗。

sentences.english: A rare behind-the-scenes glimpse at the nation's most elite military unit.
sentences.chinese: 一組美國最精銳部隊鮮爲人知的鏡頭。

sentences.english: An inexpensive cavalry unit, useful for supplementing more expensive knights.
sentences.chinese: 斯文納騎兵戰力較弱，多與精銳騎士共同出戰。

sentences.english: The Sultan Saladin and his bodyguard.
sentences.chinese: 薩拉丁和麾下精銳衛隊。

sentences.english: King Wladyslaw and his bodyguard of hand-picked knights.
sentences.chinese: 瓦迪斯瓦夫國王和他的精銳衛隊。

sentences.english: What skill do the members of this small elite community have which cannot replicated by others?
sentences.chinese: 這支精銳的小團隊有什麼不能被他人所複製的技能？

sentences.english: Well armoured Pikemen made up of Scottish nobles preferring to fight in the infantry.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭貴族組成的槍兵，盔甲精良，爲精銳步兵部隊。

sentences.english: The elite guard division we will engage is located here , on this island.
sentences.chinese: 我們要與之交戰的精銳衛隊師位於這裏，在此島上。

sentences.english: King Richard the Lionhearted and his bodyguard of hand-picked knights.
sentences.chinese: 獅心王理查和他的精銳衛隊。

sentences.english: Mamluks are the elite professional cavalry of the Egyptian Army.
sentences.chinese: 馬穆魯克爲埃及軍中極爲精銳的職業騎兵部隊。

sentences.english: The choice of the enemy troops has been completely wiped out.
sentences.chinese: 敵人的精銳部隊已被全殲。

sentences.english: Disciplined and highly trained, the Vardariotai are elite horse archers.
sentences.chinese: 這些騎兵軍紀森嚴，訓練有素，是精銳的弓騎兵。

sentences.english: Good quality heavy infantry protected by armour and equipped with foe rending two-handed axes.
sentences.chinese: 埃德薩衛隊裝備盔甲和雙手巨斧，爲精銳重裝步兵。

sentences.english: King Guy of Jerusalem and his bodyguard of hand-picked knights.
sentences.chinese: 居伊國王和麾下精銳衛隊。

definition: to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom)/to create a diversion
to fight with all one's might
lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed/unaccompanied
armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
to offer advice/to make a suggestion
to glare like a tiger watching his prey (idiom)/to eye covetously
